title: Insecure Tool Use
description: Insecure tool use occurs when agents use tools or APIs without proper security controls. This can lead to unauthorized actions or privilege escalation.
detection_patterns: No authorization checks before tool execution

mitigations.implementation: Use least privilege and authorization checks. Implement role-based access control for tools.
Isolate tool execution environments. Use containers or VMs for tool execution.
Validate and sanitize all inputs passed to tools.

references.title: OWASP Agentic Top 10 - AGENTIC02: Insecure Tool Use
